channel.title: music on Douglas Tofoli
channel.description: Recent content in music on Douglas Tofoli

item.title: We arrived on one more Friday
item.description: Hi there! I know I’m not posting with a high frequency but I want that all fridays has a music to reflect about the week. And serious, I am not in love haha. I am sure that you’ll like this music. Have a great weekend. See you.

item.title: [Music] Enjoy the last working day of the week
item.description: Hi there! Today I didn’t work on any personal projects. The day was full. There are days when we need to stop, open a beer and relax. I recommend that you to do this. Enjoy a song that a frien sent me some days ago. I loved and I want to share with you. Have a good night and a great weekend! See you monday!
